name: REPUBLIC OF GAMERS® [ɴᴛ]
description: Republic Of Gamers® [New Tab] Good news to users of the brand Asus® & Republic of Gamers®, I am proud to announce the arrival of the ROG theme now available for the first time for the Firefox New Tab!

user.name: ShinnHayabusa
user.about: Greetings! I am Shinn, a young hardcore gamer looking for the best games out there in the wide world of video games. I am a very creative and well qualified for web development, picture editing and audio editing. I tend to be very quiet since I have hard time dealing with my English. I like being with friends and screwing around, trying to keep them entertained. I sometimes let myself go a bit too often, but at least I manage to make good friends. Anything else you want to know ? Feel free to send me an email on Google + or Hotmail or even Facebook.

additional_info: Recent Fixes 1° Opacity & brightness. (July 2, 2012) 2° Glow around the pin and close newtab-cell buttons. (July 2, 2012) 3° Stretching background perfectly to all resolutions. (July 2, 2012) 4° Background fixed on the new tab page. (July 6, 2012) Instructions 1° Select your current browser below the [+ Install with Stylish] button. 2° Once you selected your preferred browser for the Stylish, press the [+ Install with Stylish] button to install the code to your plug-in. 3° Simply open a new tab to see if it worked. If no changes as been set, go to the [ S ] icon, click it then right-click on REPUBLIC OF GAMERS® [ɴᴛ] and select Enable Troubleshoot For those who are unable to see the images in the newtab-cells, please visit this page for support or send me a message on Google+, Facebook or Messenger. Credits Copyright © ShinnHayabusa, all rights reserved. Thank you for choosing ROG!
